content: experience the joy of creating your own cozy simple striped sweater with this beginner-friendly crochet pattern this versatile design is perfect for all skill levels and offers sizes ranging from s to men s 5x the pattern includes clear instructions a photo tutorial and written pattern to guide you through the process whether you prefer a fitted or oversized fit this pattern allows for customization to suit your style crocheted flat with a boat neck and long sleeves this sweater is a timeless addition to your wardrobe **unique features-** suitable for beginners sizes available from s to men s 5x customizable fit boat neck and long sleeves timeless striped design **materials needed-** lion brand jeans colors worsted weight yarn 1472-2205 yards hook 5mm us size 8 0 gauge 14 stitches by 9 row = 4 inches in double_crochet
